articles.title: GN Azad Quits Congress: "Decisions Taken By Rahul Gandhi, Or His Guards"
articles.description: Congress veteran Ghulam Nabi Azad quit his party of over five decades today with a scalding attack on Rahul Gandhi, ripping into him for "childish behaviour", "glaring immaturity" and for letting a "coterie of inexperienced sycophants" run the party.
articles.content:
Ghulam Nabi Azad had been a leading member of the G-23 or the group of 23 "dissenters".
New Delhi: Ghulam Nabi Azad, one of the Congress's tallest leaders, quit the party on Friday with a scalding a… [+4684 chars]
